website_summaries.verdict: An ergonomic, beautifully designed all-plastic carrier that will impress other humans at the vet’s office. But its airline-approved rating is debatable –better to call the airline first. Many users had trouble with warped parts that were difficult to assemble. If not put together correctly, the entire carrier can fail. Trading function for looks isn’t worth the higher price tag.
pros: Two-door access to beat the cat-loading blues, and an included food and water dish for longer trips
A seat belt can pass through the upper handle for safer car travel
The carrier is sturdy – if assembled correctly, users note
cons: Very difficult to assemble, even though it’s a snap-together
Airlines may not approve it for cargo hold because it doesn’t bolt together
Pets over 12 pounds will find this a tight fit
And there were multiple reports of the main door simply falling off

customer_reviews.title: Nice but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this carrier. It's nice and big. Room for your cat to move around. I love how it opens at the top so I can place my cat in the carrier instead of trying to push her in. I get comments every time I go to the vet about how nice it is. The only complaints I have are it's heavy and sometimes the when you close the top, the "pieces" don't quite line up. You have to maneuver it a little to get it to close correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Positives and Negatives
customer_reviews.text: My review is based on purchase of this carrier to use in rescue. Top loading crates are easier to use with hurt or frightened cats, so I was drawn to this one. While opening the top is easy, closing it involves positioning the two roof pieces more precisely than unhappy cats tend to allow. I could use this for my own cats, but a standard crate is less bulky for my average sized cats. For sure, if I were to travel with my cats, this would be an excellent choice! Hope this helps someone make the right choice for their individual situation!
customer_reviews.author: Debb

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a tall cat
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to assemble, very sturdy and secure in use. Reason for purchase was a cat who stands nearly 15 inches tall. I wanted her to have room to sit, stand, and turn around while in the carrier for vet visits. This was a great choice. Bonus, it’s easy to unclip the top fasteners so that one half of the top can swing down if a cat is more comfortable going in or out that way instead of thru the front door - though the front opening is quite large, and my cat didn’t hesitate to go in.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E.

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier I have found!
customer_reviews.text: I love these carriers! They’re perfect. I have 2. They’re nice and roomy inside so your fur babies can get up and turn around or stand up easily. The kitties can see out of the big fish bowl type front door, there’s food and water bowls included for the inside, and assembly is a cinch. I always get compliments at the vet’s office asking where I got the awesome spaceship looking carrier. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ktkt108

customer_reviews.title: Unlesd you have a kitten, your adult cat will think he's wearing this carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I checked the measurements before I bought it, but when it arrived, it was much smaller. I would have returned it, but I had to have something right away. My cats HATE it, and when we go to the vet, I have to let them out inside the car or they cry the whole time. Until I get another one, I have to use it to get from the house to the car, but it's too small and too claustrophobic to keep them in it for any length of time. Lot of money and I still need a cat carrier.
customer_reviews.author: GBPackerFan15

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrier, assembly was a bitch
customer_reviews.text: This was my crazy cat lady Christmas present to myself. I love it, it's awsome, but it was a huge pain to put together. The top shell comes in two pieces and required a bit of coercion to get to fit together.
customer_reviews.author: GearheadGurlie

customer_reviews.title: Spaceship
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my bunny and I get so many good compliments from this carrier. So I bought another one which is color orange for my other bunny. Some even suggested that it looked like a spaceship.
customer_reviews.author: shopping girl

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier for rabbits!
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in other reviews, this thing is a beast to assemble, but once you have it right it is reliable and remarkably sturdy. We use it to transport our two rabbits (one bout 3 pounds, one closer to 6). Our vet loves the top opening, which saves everyone so much stress. I'm not sure I would be willing to fly with this, but it's perfect for car trips and the seatbelt buckles it right in. Haven't found anything better!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Overall I really enjoy the carrier
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really enjoy the carrier. There'e plenty of room for both of my rabbits who are both a good size. I like the multiple doors and the see through front. My only issue is the plastic clasps at the top. They are flimsy and annoying. They're hard to open and I'm always worried they're gonna pop open. Everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I love this cage and so does my cat
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage and so does my cat. It is very sturdy and the top opens so you can put your pet in from the top as well. The food and water dishes inside are also nice. My cat is about 4 pounds and is the perfect size for her to stand and lay down in comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: POORLY PACKAGED FOR SHIPPING.  Description misleading for sturdy, easy carry cargo carrier.
customer_reviews.text: The product was a cargo cat carrier. I did not like it because it required a substantial amount to be put together, was a thin type of plastic, and did not have the top carrier handles, like I wanted/needed, for carrying a heavy cat, , did not have the carrier handles on the top like the one I wanted had, in order to easily carry a heavy cat, and THE BOX THAT IT WAS SHIPPED IN WAS NOT STURDY ENOUGH TO KEEP PRODUCT FROM GETTING DAMAGED. IT WAS SHIPPED IN PRODUCT BOX WITH NO OVERBOX FOR SHIPPING!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: After being in my cart for over a year, I'm glad i finally took the leap.
customer_reviews.text: A lot more sturdier than I thought it was! Not that hard to put together. It's also bigger than expected. Will fit my 23 lb cat perfectly. (He's thick not fat) Wish the top side door was a little smoother to close for the price but overall happy I finally bought this. Pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: The entire carrier is flimsy, especially the door handle ...
customer_reviews.text: The entire carrier is flimsy, especially the door handle. I had to leave my cat at the vet's overnight for dental surgery so I didn't use this carrier because I didn't want the door handle to accidentally break if not used properly. I'll use it for routine visits where I can gently open the door myself.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Once it was together it is sturdy and my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a little tricky to snap together but with some tenacity, I did it on my own, no four hands needed as stated in other reviews. Once it was together it is sturdy and my cat loves it. I like how easy it is to put food and water through the front without opening the entire door. It looks kind of space age but the benefits of the animals site line is worth it. I'm not sure I would ever use the shoulder strap it comes with but for someone else, that feature may be attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is cool, but there was no shoulder strap attached.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Xu

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: We got a LOT of cats. This is THE best carrier. We now have three. Vets love it because they can open the top. Cats love it for all the room. I can even pet the beastie thru the door without any fear of escape. (my hand will just fit thru the food/water access hole in the door) The very best! And takes a lot of hard knocks.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t love this any more. It has the food and water dish in the door and looks so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn K. Tank

customer_reviews.title: A big plus is that you can get replacement parts.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this carrier for a number of years. I take my cat regularly to the vet for nail trims. Recently, the latch to the door broke. I was going to purchase another carrier but was delighted to see that I could simply purchase another door. This carrier gives front door or top loading options and it's so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy it is transport her everywhere and even ...
customer_reviews.text: The cat loves it when it is far her. I love how easy it is transport her everywhere and even in Barbados will I'll be ready to make the move.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Desgranges

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: No stars. Would never put one of my cats in that carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Astrin

customer_reviews.title: it is an excellent carrier for any outing or travel situation
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the corner of my dining room as his private dining room while I'm working in the kitchen, or we are eating. He expects to go there for the snack and willingly goes into the carrier with my praise, of course. He can see through the front door, eats the snack and usually takes a little nap until the meal is over or I remember to let him out! Of course, it is an excellent carrier for any outing or travel situation, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Haubold

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is the most easy carrier I have bought. Pick up the cat or dog and put them right in and snap the top close and when your done taking them to the vets or bring in the grocerys or the cat does not run out the door. I would recommend this to anyone I knew, and the first time I saw this item is at my work FedEx Express going down the belt into my neighbors truck that I was loading. And I read the box to see how it works come home and order it and now I love it. Get it it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lowen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bunnies!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these carriers for my little bun-buns. They are perfect if you MUST fly them (and we all know airlines don't usually allow bunnie sin cabin). Ventilated, hard, built in removable food/water cups, and easy access. What more could you ask for?? I'm cnstantly getting compliments on this carrier as well....people cna't help but say soemthing about my "space bunnies!"
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small pet personnal transport
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I expected. Won't due for commercial transport of a pet. I had to fix one of the door posts (it was bent). It is very versatile in respect to opening from the top or front and will be easy to clean. Price was right for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: captG

customer_reviews.title: COOL CARRIER CATS LIKE IT I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: Put it together in less than 10 minutes. The door is amazing & so secure & already bulit just line up the tabs & click in place so much better than other carriers where the door is just attached by little metal rods
customer_reviews.author: Regina U.

customer_reviews.title: Worked just fine for a move from Michigan to Texas
customer_reviews.text: Spacious for my larger, elderly cat. Worked just fine for a move from Michigan to Texas... seemed quite roomy and comfortable for my pal. The "split top" design is a little funky, but it did make it easier to get him in there.
customer_reviews.author: babyjeans

customer_reviews.title: I love this carrier
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier. I gave it 4 stars because I expected it to be much sturdier than it seems for the price I paid, but so far it seems to be holding up well. Time will tell if it will last as long as my last carrier did.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent carrier. This is the easiest carrier ever to load/unload my pets. It works well on vacations and going to the vet. It is 100% hard plastic that snaps and locks together. Airline not accepted, but for regular transporting it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Toby B.

customer_reviews.title: Like Alot, Repurchased
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Travels well. My cats are not good travelers, but this allows thems to kind of peek out without actually being out.
customer_reviews.author: NurseSharon

customer_reviews.title: Unique cat carrier design!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design....a little difficult to assemble but structure is solid once that is done
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Looks futuristic but didn't stay together too well.
customer_reviews.text: All pieces go together smoothly but once cat was inside the front door pushed out of place easily.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Its a great carrier to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Its a great carrier to travel with. My maltipoo sleeps in it during the day which says a lot about it.
customer_reviews.author: Nica

customer_reviews.title: there were only poor picture directions
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to assemble, there were only poor picture directions, and if everything isn't lined up correctly you risk breaking some of the links while trying to correct them. I thought having the top opening would be great for ease of access, but it takes longer than needed to line up the connections when you want to close it, making the animal all the more nervous after a visit to the vet, and also makes you extra cautious when carrying it (hoping the top won't open), The door snapped apart a few months after we purchased this, although our pet still uses it for her bed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bradley

customer_reviews.title: nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Only thing is i use it for carrying my rabbits. And they have chewed their plastic slip in bowls where they are no longer holding any food or water. But i use glass bowls inside the carrier. And attatch with velcro to the bottom so it will stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: stephaniekonwerski

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Cats do not like it, the plastic door lacks ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Elegance and Openess
customer_reviews.text: When I adopted my kitty she loved being transported home in this carrier, so much more open and elegant than previous carriers I've had in years past!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Magnusson

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier. Works great. Highly recommend!!! My kitty even likes to curl up and nap in it. Best one we've had yet.
customer_reviews.author: bejel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing carrier!!
customer_reviews.text: I have read the reviews on this and was under the impression that it was difficult to put together, we have two cats and are moving to Japan in two months and need new carriers for them that I fully trusted and would meet airline requirements for our 5 flights! I put them both together myself in under five minutes so I don't see how they are difficult for everyone else? I love everything about this carriers and have no dislikes about them! They are worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Eigel

customer_reviews.title: Gets tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: This makes taking your pet to the vet so easy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Oakden

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The carrier is not what I expected. The plastic is very flimsy, especially all the parts used for putting the thing together and locking it. It is hard to line it up to lock and I hold my breath every time I use it and hope that the hinges on the door don't break. I give it two stars because it is spacious an the access through the top makes it easy to take the kitty out at the vet's.
customer_reviews.author: Isabela

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing, returning it tomorrow
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design. Difficult to too close and secure the top loading opening and latch. I can't imagine putting my cat in here and getting it closed. I sure wish the website accurately displayed the the way this cat carrier opens and closes. Had I known, I never would have purchased it. Sorry I wasted my time. I received it today, and I'm returning it tomorrow. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: psychetri

customer_reviews.title: tricky enough for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat is crazy and hates crates. I got this becuase of the door being clear and being able to be locked with one hand . I tricked her into getting in there!!
customer_reviews.author: tink51586

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bunny
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is perfect for my bunny. It is large enough to be able to put his litter in with him. But not too big that I worry about him getting hurt if I stop too quickly. I love that this can be strapped down with a seat belt.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Conneely

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful carrier. My chihuahua loves this and I love this. It has a built in food/water tray, which is very convenient for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: gina1230

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love catit. Great job. I have mainecoons and its perfect for our big kitties
customer_reviews.author: traci l. davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Crate for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Yorkies~Love all the multifunctions...Opening top and clear see through front is wonderful...Love the food dishes that can be put in from the front without opening the whole door. I will buy another soon...
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: They're especially great for our parrots when we take them to shows ...
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these carriers for our zoo! They're especially great for our parrots when we take them to shows or to the veterinarian!
customer_reviews.author: Ollie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best cat carrier on the planet
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing carrier. This seller shipped timely provided tracking it is extremely sturdy and well-built. It took all of three minutes to put it together and I absolutely love itI will never own another cat carrier but this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Chim

customer_reviews.title: Not all that impressed
customer_reviews.text: This carrier was not easy to put together. I suggest you have someone help, and some parts do not line up as easily as they should. Once together it looks good, but I would not use this on an airplane. It is flimsy, and though I use it for transport between my house and the vet, I do not think it would offer much protection should an accident occur. I would not buy another, nor would I recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: JC Cats

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Cat Carrier we have had
customer_reviews.text: Greatest Cat Carrier we have had, and we have three now, vets love them easy access, great for shows and for travel as well. Pity they are no longer available in NZ.
customer_reviews.author: Dyan T.

customer_reviews.title: Finally the right size
customer_reviews.text: The carriers work well. I like the large window on the front and all the vent holes for my cat to look out of. The only thing (and its not much of anything) is that the clips on the top have to be perfectly lined up or the top cover won't close. With a cat inside trying to get out, it makes it difficult that the top cover doesn't close quickly
customer_reviews.author: laura hicks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic design, great features, PLENTY STURDY and really, NOT THAT HARD TO PUT TOGETHER. A way better carrier for the same price or cheaper than you'd buy a boring one for.
customer_reviews.author: IndieNate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this for trips to the vet or visits to grandmas house!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Cain

customer_reviews.title: Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our cat and traveling needs Nice food and water dishes We probably will not use the carrying strap
customer_reviews.author: tara t furman

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I will keep it because it is hard case and lightweight but you have to assemble it, not tricky.. NOT SUITABLE for Air Cargo Transport, lacks integrity and ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: great idea, not so great materials used...
customer_reviews.text: the idea of a top loading carrier is excellent. but be advised. this carrier is not sturdy. never, ever use it on commercial airlines or any other commercial way of traveling. i purchased this because it simply makes the vet visit easier for most of my cats. the top opens, less trauma of trying to get the cat out. but it is not made well, and i always use an additional strap to secure. again, the big advantage is it is simple to get the cat out of the carrier or in some cases the vet can treat the animal right in the carrier itself. but it is not a secure, well made carrier.
customer_reviews.author: francie5

customer_reviews.title: It was a little difficult to put together but once done it was fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This carrier was a hit with my kitty and everyone else who saw it. It was a little difficult to put together but once done it was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl WW

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pet carrier. We run a small non-profit animal rescue and it's important that our critters aren't frightened when being transported anywhere--like to the vet's office. This gives them plenty of room and light, but offers the safety of being in a secure place. HIghly recommend this carrier!
customer_reviews.author: Tylermade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier. Sturdy and stylish with plenty of room for larger cats.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Catit Cabrio Carrier
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier!! It is definitely NOT a carrier for airlines. I was worried about some of the negative reviews that other people posted. However, I have found that if everything is secure properly then it should not come apart. This carrier is great for trips to vet or trips in general. I have a Ragdoll cat (Big) and he fits really well in this carrier. I love that there is a lot of ventilation. I recommend for car travel, but not air travel.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not for a long bodied cat
customer_reviews.text: This carrier has nice some nice features but is a very short carrier. It was advertised as large but my Maine Coon would have a hard time fitting in length. I will keep it as I have other cats that are smaller but I wouldn't recommend buying it for a large cat. I also wonder about its durability, especially the clear plastic parts. The entire carrier is constructed of plastic so at some point I see hinges, etc., breaking. I feel the price is somewhat high based on the construction.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: does the job and more
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, I assume? and easy to get my cats in. easy to fill food and was a breeze to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: it's me

customer_reviews.title: Very good carrier. It opens from top or front so ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good carrier. It opens from top or front so it's easy to get your cat in. Just make sure the top the latches are fully closed so it doesn't open up on you
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

product_meta.title: Catit Design Cabrio Multi-Functional Carrier System, Gray
product_meta.description: In its own ultimate class, the Catit Design Cabrio Multi-Functional Carrier System for cats and toy breed dogs combines superior safety features with ease of use for five-star pet accommodations on the go. Meeting airline regulations, the Catit Design Cabrio is the perfect choice for your air travel needs. Ideal for those necessary vet visits when your pet is highly stressed, the Catit Design Cabrio has innovative features including its Opening Top Hatch which allows you to place and remove your pet from the carrier with ease. For added security, the Catit Design Cabrio can be secured in your vehicle with a conventional seatbelt. Meeting airline regulations, your pet can go where you go. Suitable for pets up to 25 pounds in weight and 13.75" in height, the Catit Design Cabrio comes with a five-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with Catit
